extendedInfo.description: This one-off upgrade unlocks extra features in the free version of Gift Pony.IMPORTANT: The free version MUST be installed. This app will NOT work by itself.After installing, exit from the app store and launch Gift Pony as normal. New features will be enabled automatically.Upgrade features:â¢ Unlimited giftsâ¢ Password protectionâ¢ Backup and restoreâ¢ Support the developer

reviews.title: Edit
reviews.comment: Would like to be able to edit my people eg name, picture.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful app.
reviews.comment: Does what it says, works with no issues. A great addition to a good app,  very happy to pay for this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent app. Suggestions: add own categories. MUST CHANGE: When gift split between 3 people then the amount should split also!!!! Please change!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app, but use with care
reviews.comment: So I really liked the app, then I updated my phone and couldn\'t access it.  Well it turns out that when you install pro, it\'s not accessible unless you also install the trial version.  Very confusing and you\'d think there would be some check on install.  I spent more time than it was worth trying to figure this out.  The other thing is that I thought I had a backup on my micro SD card, turns out it was only the pictures, you have to manually run an export to store the gift data.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Professional and nicely done. By far the best gift list app I have used.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Shopping just got better!
reviews.comment: I\'ve used the free version before  and loved it. Just upgraded to this version and it\'s even better! Password protected now! No spoiled surprises!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Installed it n won\'t show up and it wont let me get a refund???? does anyone know how to get ahold of someone who can help me? :( I really wanted this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app but they con you into getting the paid version
reviews.comment: Great, straightforward app. But you can only input about 5 gifts before you have to buy the upgrade in order to add more data.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Works as advertised! Best on Market.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Installed then disappeared
reviews.comment: I installed this app, was using it for a while & loving it - until one day it disappeared. According to my phone settings is still there but it\'s no where to be seen. Really disappointing!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very happy with this paid app. I have been using since last year, just keeps getting better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Maggie
reviews.comment: Trail version so far good have reached limit so now upgraded. So far happy with app and trail did what it said it would do
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Really happy with this app, very simple and easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unhappy customer
reviews.comment: I had the app installed and I had a quite a few things saved and then it disappeared. What a disappointment!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Was great for the gift buying while on vacation
reviews.author: A Google User
